hero.title: Positano to Ravello — Ferry then Bus (via Amalfi)
hero.description: Use this guide to travel from Positano to Ravello by combining a scenic ferry to Amalfi and a SITA bus up to Ravello. It covers the walk to the port, ticket tips, where to transfer in Amalfi, and what to expect on arrival in Ravello.

tip.label: Tip
tip.body: Need other transport options? Open the <Link>How to Get Here overview</Link> for buses, airport transfers, and mixed itineraries.

overview.title: Journey overview
points: Route: Positano → Amalfi by ferry, then Amalfi → Ravello by SITA bus.
Allow extra time in high season for queues and connections.
Check live ferry and bus schedules on the day of travel.

walk.title: Walk to Positano’s port
walk.intro: You can follow a well-trodden stair route from the hostel down to Spiaggia Grande. If you have heavy luggage, consider sending bags with the porter service and walking light.
steps: Exit Hostel Brikette, go down the steps to the main road, and turn left (Via G. Marconi).
Walk a little over 100 m to the right-hand turn (tabacchi on the corner).
Buy a bus ticket for Amalfi → Ravello at the tabacchi if convenient.
Continue downhill; at the first hairpin bend, take the stairs shortcut off the road.
Follow the stairs and paths downhill, crossing the road where indicated.
At the bottom, turn right, pass through the archway, and continue ~50 m to the port.
walk.link: Prefer a map-based walkthrough? See <Link>Chiesa Nuova → Beach (fewest stairs)</Link>.

ferry.title: Buy ferry tickets
notes: At the port, compare departures and prices at the operator booths.
Typical operators: Travelmar and Lucibello (confirm next departure to Amalfi).
Arrive 15–20 minutes early in summer to board calmly.
ferry.resources: Check latest times and prices on <TravelmarLink>Travelmar</TravelmarLink> and <PositanoLink>Positano.com – Ferry schedules</PositanoLink>.

transfer.title: Transfer in Amalfi
notes: Disembark at Amalfi and walk a short distance to the bus stop area.
If you didn’t buy a ticket in Positano, purchase an Amalfi → Ravello ticket now.
Queue for the Ravello-bound bus; routes are typically 5110/5120 (check the display).
transfer.resources: Consult SITA routes and times on <SitaLink>Positano.com (SITA timetable overview)</SitaLink>.

arrival.title: Arriving in Ravello
notes: Ravello sits above Amalfi; many sights cluster around Piazza Duomo.
Follow local signage to your accommodation from the drop-off point.
For late arrivals or long gaps, consider a taxi from Amalfi instead of waiting.
